2.0.3.name: wordpress/another-wordpress-meta-plugin
2.0.3.description:
This plugin is no longer supported or maintained.

Add META tags like keywords and descriptions to your posts and pages.

If you'd like to optimize your blog for search engines, All in One SEO Pack might be helpful too ...

After activation you have several additional fields when editing/creating pages and posts. Just insert your keywords, descriptions etc. there.
